summary: General Electric (GE) was a big American company started in 1892, with businesses in many areas like aerospace, energy, healthcare, and finance. It was one of the largest companies in the U.S. but faced challenges after the 2000s recession. GE sold off some divisions and focused on aviation. In 2021, it was decided to split GE into three smaller companies: GE Aerospace, GE Healthcare, and GE Vernova. This breakup is still happening, with GE Healthcare becoming a separate company in 2023.
title: General Electric
